ctu_text: The scheme provides a monthly pension of Rs. 650 to transgender persons who are above 18 years of age and belong to the BPL (Below Poverty Line) category. A monthly pension of Rs. 1200 is provided to transgender persons who are above 80 years or 70% disability.
